name: Bread Machine Caraway Rye
description: Light and fluffy rye sandwich bread with a nice dark crust from the bread machine.

recipeInstructions.text: Put all ingredients into your bread machine in the order recommended by the manufacturer. Set the machine for a standard loaf (if the machine has several settings), a large loaf, and a dark crust.
When the bread is done, remove it from the machine, remove it from the pan, and let it cool completely on a rack before slicing.
